profile.name: Víctor
profile.title: Data Lover and blockchain superfan
profile.description:
Talented, hard worker and all-rounder Data Lover, specialized in Business Intelligence and Data
Visualization. I also work in Big Data, Data Governance and Data Science projects. I am able to
work well in a team and independently. I am used to managing under pressure besides being
open-minded and reliable. I am multidisciplinary with high knowledge of new technologies
including crypto & blockchain. I have a high adaptation and learning capacity.
I am a technology enthusiast, always ready to learn something new.
Since December 2013, when I discovered Bitcoin and blockchain, I have been investigating and
studying around them. I am now running some nodes from different blockchains.
